title: Master of Shitcoins
author: Master of Shitcoins
content: Huge news for Avalanche: Amazon has now selected Avalanche to invent various Blockchain products and most likely, Amazon decided to select Avalanche because of Subnets. Subnets are unique at Avalanche and can be customized to launch own networks on Avalanche for companies and also governments. Subnets are growing fast on Avalanche. Amazon decided now to take an opportunity by selecting Avalanche: https://medium.com/avalancheavax/ava-labs-and-aws-bring-scalable-blockchain-solutions-to-enterprises-and-governments-295040a34263Right now, we don't know much about when Amazon is really going to start and how it will look like but here's a good article from Medium evaluing expectations from such a massive deal. Amazon is a big company and it will be very profitable for Avalanche. What's your expectation from such a great news from Avalanche as well as for Blockchain in general as a big company such like Amazon is pro Blockchain and actively involved now?
